name: waiting
description: uncertainties of the unrefreshed / a sea of caches where our fragmented / consciousness lies / waiting for a page to render / hopes / feelings / thoughts / that may never see the light of day / the blue light of a monitor / and through that dim screen-sun / we wait to render / and to be rendered / until our header collapses / or until the next refresh / when we finally get to see our friends / or do this boring job / yet again
